attributes.action: Reduce road congestion by restricting the issue of driving licences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a tax-free alternative to other proposed methods of reducing road congestion, the control of driving licences should be implemented such that a fixed maximum number are in issued at any one time, and that to receive a licence a queue must be joined.  Loss of a driving licence (due to a conviction) would require rejoining the queue after the sentence period.
